conclusion: A drives towards several groups of blocks of different colors to determine collisions and final stop position based on power, collision, and deflection effects.
The image shows a green truck labeled 'A' moving towards a red cube, with other colored blocks (yellow, blue, purple, green) scattered nearby.
The truck hits the red cube first because it lies directly in its entry path.
The red cube is lighter, so it is pushed aside while the truck continues along nearly the same line, slowed a little but still moving.
The slowed truck now lines up with and bumps into the next nearest obstacle – the blue cube – again pushing it aside while losing more speed.
By the time the truck meets the yellow cube, its speed is low; the final collision robs it of the remaining kinetic energy.
The truck stops just past the yellow cube after losing almost all of its forward speed.
